analysis.description:
BurnableOpenPayment.internalRelease (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e69c3cb4f08aba18bad6da03f5c5441014d4169.sol#178-199) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- success = recipient.send(amount) (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e69c3cb4f08aba18bad6da03f5c5441014d4169.sol#183-184)

BurnableOpenPayment.internalBurn (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e69c3cb4f08aba18bad6da03f5c5441014d4169.sol#149-170) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0

BurnableOpenPayment.internalBurn (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e69c3cb4f08aba18bad6da03f5c5441014d4169.sol#149-170) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0
BurnableOpenPayment.internalRelease (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e69c3cb4f08aba18bad6da03f5c5441014d4169.sol#178-199) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0
